message.content:
The most likely category for this paper is "Books" because it discusses the original Michael Crichton novel of Jurassic Park. 

The second likely category is "Movies & TV" because it mentions the film version of Jurassic Park.

The third likely category is "Kindle Store" because it mentions the option to buy a Kindle.

The fourth likely category is "Toys & Games" because it mentions the theme park aspect of Jurassic Park.

The fifth likely category is "Collectibles & Fine Art" because it mentions the film's CGI creation and character development, which could be related to collectible items or artwork.

prompt:
Title: Jurassic Park
Content: Unless your species evolved sometime after 1993 whenJurassic Parkhit theaters, you're no doubt familiar with this dinosaur-bites-man disaster tale set on an island theme park gone terribly wrong. But if Speilberg's amped-up CGI creation left you longing for more scientific background and ... well, character development, check out the original Michael Crichton novel. Although not his best book (get ahold of sci-fi classicThe Andromeda Strainfor that),Jurassic Parkfills out the film version's kine...
